What if I have some data want saved in function initialization?
I think put that data inside class init, and use the same function object all the time can be much cleaner.

body:
Can anyone explain why pytorch is designed to use new function object every time? 
What if I have some data want saved in function initialization? 
I think put that data inside class __init__, and use the same function object all the time can be much cleaner.
